title: Fps Dropping
body: Ever since 4 days ago on 11-2-17 my fps just dropped to 20-40 i normally get 60 fps in 2 very high settings, shadows off, and 1 very low settigns can someone help me here? i tried almost everything i could think of Reinstalling, Check for corrupt files, running my anti virus, unistalling everything, and putting everything on very low and even still on very low and did all those things i still get 20-40 Riot can u help me find a solution or anyone i only have 4 things on google bc of riot I have Google,Discord, League, and pbe Can someone help me please?

replies.body: A couple things that could be causing an issue with your FPS is that your drivers are not up to date, or your graphics needs to be reset! Go ahead and run through the steps in our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684) and it should get you back in working order.
Ty! it helped me a bit
Do you know how to reset graphics? because im not very good at doing laptop things or anything that has technology involved
hey, theres a game breaking, or rather preventing issue rn, i posted a thread about it if you wouldnt mind looking in bugs.

Try having nothing else open when playing League then, i have a school laptop to play LoL on and i normally get 60fps too with no other window open, with say spotify or discord open i get rough Frame lag which drops my frames down to say 7fps every 5 seconds
i had nothing opened either my anti virus closed and discord closed still lagging
You setting your battery options to high performance my dudee?
